mapper.insert: insert into user_profiles( user_id, last_name, first_name, last_name_kana, first_name_kana, postal_code, prefecture, city, town, address_number, building, birthday, phone_number, email) values( #{userId}, #{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{lastNameKana}, #{firstNameKana}, #{postalCode}, #{prefecture}, #{city}, #{town}, #{addressNumber}, #{building}, #{birthday}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email});
mapper.update: update user_profiles set postal_code = #{postalCode}, prefecture = #{prefecture}, city = #{city}, town = #{town}, address_number = #{addressNumber}, building = #{building}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email} where user_id = #{userId};
